venue.name: Concord Old North Bridge Visitor's Center

item.description:
THE SCENE: This has been a favorite location for this group for years now.  In particular, the terraced garden overlooking the Old North Bridge.  There are views of the bridge, meadow, a sandy path with large overlooking trees, and the stately visitor's center itself.

WHEN: 2 hours starting at the posted time

RSVP POLICY: ***NOTE THAT THIS EVENT IS SUBJECT TO CANCELLATION IF THERE ARE 3 OR FEWER ARTISTS RSVPd.  SO CHECK YOUR INBOX OR THIS CALENDAR THE DAY OF THE EVENT***

SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS: None

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS: With the Old North Bridge on your left, continue driving and take your first left.  At the top of the hill is the visitor's center.  Walk across the garden to the terrace and you'll find us.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant,  Paper towels,  Sweater, water, food

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. If in doubt, feel free to contact me.

CONTACT:
Michael Emerald, CFA
Organizer
617/968-0627
Emerald@PerformanceBusinessDesign.com
item.name: PLEIN AIR OUTING: Old North Bridge Visitor's Center, Concord
